text: Hard Fists is a 1927 American silent western film directed by William Wyler and starring Art Acord, Louise Lorraine and Gilbert Holmes.Munden p.325 The film's sets were designed by the art director David S. Garber. ==Cast== * Art Acord as Art Alvord * Louise Lorraine as Betty Barnes * Gilbert Holmes as Jed Leach * Albert J. Smith as Charles Crane ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1927 films Category:1927 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films directed by William Wyler Category:Universal Pictures films
title: Hard Fists
